name: Harold
profile:
RPG Maker MV hero. He can use sword and magic.
He acts as an all-rounder in SRPG battle.

name: Therese
profile:
Female warrior who use axe. She has high offensive and defensive power.
She can withstands attack and guards player behind her in SRPG battle.

name: Marcia
profile:
Female witch. She casts powerful attack magic.
She attacks indirectly from long distance in SRPG battle.

name: Lucius
profile:
Calm priest. He masters recovery magic.
He can healing allies and do long range attack by bow in SRPG Battle.

name: Alex
profile:
Adventurer. He uses spear with 2 squares range attack.
He fights as a middle fighter in SRPG Battle.

name: Oscar
profile:
General of the kingdom. He looks cold, but actually always
care for his subordinate. Fight automatically in battle.

name: Super tester
profile:
This crazy guy can do everything.
He can move after action.

name: Swordsman
note:
<aiTarget: (dmg < b.hp? dmg : 1.5 * dmg) * b.mhp/(1 + b.hp)>
<aiCounter: 0.5*dmg * a.mhp/(1 +a.hp)>
<aiPos:[(1/(0.75 + 0.25 * f.ntd('foe'))) * (f.ntd('foe') < 6 ? (1 + 0.05 * ([2,3].contains(tr) ? tr*tr : 0)) * Math.min((f.ntw('friend',5)+3)/(f.ntw('foe',5)+2), 1.5): 1),(a.mhp/(a.hp + 1)) * Math.max(Math.min(0.75*a.mhp - a.hp, a.hp,0.2*a.mhp),0) * (f.isf('enemyFort') + f.isf('actorFort') + (f.ntd('foe') < 6 ? (f.ntd('foe')-1)/10:0)) + (f.isf('enemyFort') + f.isf('actorFort') * 0.25 * Math.max(5 - f.ntd('foe'), 0))*0.18*a.mhp]>
profile: Standard battle unit with average ability.

Fast, ranged battle unit. He can kill enemies from
 a very far distance.

profile:
Magic unit with heal skills. She recovers mp each turn.
She also has an aura skill which reduces magic damage.

name: Home Crystal
profile:
The goal of the game.
It can't do anything.

name: Defense Crystal
profile:
Powerful AoE skill to defend itself.
However, it can't do any counter attack or move.
